message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product that I believe you'll find valuable. I think a fair starting price would be $14,000. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you coming down to $14,000, but I'm looking to pay closer to $13,000.  What do you think?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob.  While I can't go as low as $13,000, I'm willing to meet you halfway at $13,500. This is a very competitive price for a product of this quality.
